sentences.sContent: They could have withdrawn into the mountain fastness of Eryri.
sentences.sCn: 他们本来可以撤回到艾瑞的山区要塞里。

synos.tran: 牢固；不褪色；要塞；巩固；堡垒；迅速

words.tran: 快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的
扣件；钮扣；按钮；使系牢之物
使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于

trans.tranCn: 牢固, 固定(性), 不褪色(性), 放荡, 僻静的处所, 抗(毒)性, 要塞, 巩固
trans.tranOther: A fastness is a place, such as a castle, which is considered safe because it is difficult to reach or easy to defend against attack
